passive.name: Chase
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to {{2}}% by an extra <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer defeats an enemy, their ATK is increased by <orangeStrong>{{4}}%</orangeStrong> for {{5}} turn(s).
